instructions:
Rinse scallops *(or oysters)* and pat dry with paper towels. Cut any very large scallops in half. In shallow
bowl mix flour, salt and pepper. In another bowl mix water and beaten egg. Roll scallops in flour, then dip
into egg mixture and roll in cracker meal. Place on waxed paper and refrigerate for at least 1 hour. Fry half
of scallops at a time in 375 F oil for 2 1/2 minutes. DO NOT OVERCOOK. Drain on paper towels and keep
warm in 200 F oven while frying remainder. Serve with tarter or cocktail sauce. Serves 4. *(Oysters or
peeled shrimp with tail may be substituted for scallops)*. 
*(Rev. 2/28/97)*
ingredients: 1 lb sea scallops (or select oysters or jumbo shrimp)
name: Fried Scallops
creator: OR OYSTERS OR SHRIMP
